mapper.select: select to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') year, to_char(b.dt, 'mm') month, nvl(sum(amount*price),0) totalPrice, nvl(count(o.order_date),0) totalAmount from (select to_date(o.order_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd')order_date, o.refund_flag refund_flag, c.amount amount, p.price price from ordered o, cart c, product p where o.cart_id = c.id and c.product_id=p.id and c.status='Y' and refund_flag='N' and to_char(order_date,'yyyy-mm') between to_char(add_months(sysdate,-5),'yyyy-mm') and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm')) o, (select to_date(sysdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') - level + 1 as dt from dual connect by level <= (to_date(sysdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') - to_date(add_months(sysdate,-5), 'yyyy/mm/dd')))b where b.dt = o.order_date(+) group by to_char(b.dt, 'mm') order by to_char(b.dt, 'mm')
